Marc Stevens (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Stevens_(actor) 0 Marc Stevens (September 2, 1943 – January 28, 1989), was an American erotic performer. He is sometimes credited as Mark '10½' Stevens or Mark Stevens. Marc_Stevens ( September_2_,_1943 – January_28_,_1989 ) , was an_American_erotic_performer . He is_sometimes_credited as Mark '_10_½_'_Stevens or Mark_Stevens .
